response.original_title: Camino del Amor - Kristály, Örvény, Fény
response.overview: This film is different for everyone: What is this film like, what does it reveal deep inside us, and why does it show a different story to everyone? For those who have walked the Camino, it is a road movie, a musical moving picture of rotoscope watercolor images; for others, it is a full-length clip, a latent dance, therapy, meditation, or documentary film... If viewers open their hearts, just like the pilgrims on the Camino, the film leads them into their inner reality, into a different state of consciousness: the world of unresolved relationships, life situations, and possible futures. This makes it a universal dramatized fiction: How far will you go on the path of self-discovery?
response.title: Camino del Amor - Kristály, Örvény, Fény
